projects.subtitle: Personal Spotify Library Search
projects.description:
I'm constantly crafting new playlists, many of which have a theme. I wanted a tool that allowed me to more easily search my own song library in Spotify.

The first features I implemented are searching by keyword in song titles and searching by song duration. In one case, this helped me find candidates for an 'abbreviated' playlist where every track is under 2 minutes long.

projects.title: ConfyScratchy
projects.subtitle: Group Discussion Tool for Educators
projects.description:
Confidence Report: For a question with N choices, each student has a budget of N points to distribute among them. Their score is how many points were allotted to the correct answer.

Scratch Card: A small group discusses each question and decides which answer choice to 'scratch' first. If correct, their score is equal to the number of answer choices. Otherwise, the group can scratch another answer for fewer points until the correct answer is found.
